site_name: Ballinger Canyon OHV Day Use Riding  Area
fee_info:
Day use parking is $10/day. Concession-managed area. Campground is $20/night by reservation:
www.recreation.gov
or first-come, first-served. Reservations on weekends year-round are strongly recommended.
restrooms: Restrooms are available at this site.
water: Potable water is not available at this site.

fee_info: This site is managed by the Parks Management Concession Company for the Forest Service. $30/night for camping, $10 per extra vehicle per night.  Interagency Senior and Acess Passes provide pass holders with 50% off of camping fees - not valid for day use or extra vehicle parking fee.

fee_info: Group site #1 is $150 per night. Group site #2 is $150 per night.
directions: From I-5, take Frazier Park exit (Frazier Mountain Park Road), go west approximately 6 miles. The road name changes to Cuddy Valley Road. Continue on it up Mt. Pinos. The road name changes to Mt. Pinos Highway. McGill Campground is approximately 5 miles further on the north side of road.
